movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II
movies.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
movies.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies.plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

movies.title: Shichinin no samurai
movies.plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.title: Cidade de Deus
movies.plot: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

movies.title: La vita è bella
movies.plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

movies.title: Joker
movies.plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movies.title: Star Wars
movies.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
movies.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: Gisaengchung
movies.plot: All unemployed, Ki-taek and his family take peculiar interest in the wealthy and glamorous Parks, as they ingratiate themselves into their lives and get entangled in an unexpected incident.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Léon
movies.plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies.title: Seppuku
movies.plot: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.plot: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

movies.title: American History X
movies.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

movies.title: Modern Times
movies.plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

movies.title: Psycho
movies.plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles forty thousand dollars from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Intouchables
movies.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.title: City Lights
movies.plot: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: C'era una volta il West
movies.plot: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.plot: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not he should help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.

movies.title: Hotaru no haka
movies.plot: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

movies.title: Rear Window
movies.plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

movies.title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
movies.plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

movies.title: Alien
movies.plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: Memento
movies.plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.title: The Great Dictator
movies.plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.plot: After the devastating events of Vingadores: Guerra Infinita (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Das Leben der Anderen
movies.plot: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

movies.title: Paths of Glory
movies.plot: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies.title: WALL·E
movies.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies.title: Mononoke-hime
movies.plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

movies.title: Sunset Blvd.
movies.plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

movies.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
movies.plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

movies.title: Oldeuboi
movies.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

movies.title: Witness for the Prosecution
movies.plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies.title: Aliens
movies.plot: Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team after being in hypersleep for 57 years. The moon that the Nostromo visited has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

movies.title: Kimi no na wa.
movies.plot: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

movies.title: American Beauty
movies.plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies.title: Coco
movies.plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

movies.title: Das Boot
movies.plot: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

movies.title: 3 Idiots
movies.plot: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
movies.plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

movies.title: Taare Zameen Par
movies.plot: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Amadeus
movies.plot: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting
movies.plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

movies.title: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
movies.plot: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

movies.title: Dangal
movies.plot: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

movies.title: Vertigo
movies.plot: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.plot: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

movies.title: Jagten
movies.plot: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

movies.title: Full Metal Jacket
movies.plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

movies.title: A Clockwork Orange
movies.plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

movies.title: Snatch
movies.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.title: The Kid
movies.plot: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

movies.title: Ladri di biciclette
movies.plot: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

movies.title: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
movies.plot: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movies.title: Singin' in the Rain
movies.plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

movies.title: Taxi Driver
movies.plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

movies.title: Lawrence of Arabia
movies.plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.title: The Sting
movies.plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

movies.title: Metropolis
movies.plot: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

movies.title: Per qualche dollaro in più
movies.plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

movies.title: Capharnaüm
movies.plot: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

movies.title: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
movies.plot: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

movies.title: Double Indemnity
movies.plot: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

movies.title: Ikiru
movies.plot: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

movies.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
movies.plot: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

movies.title: The Apartment
movies.plot: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movies.plot: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

movies.title: Up
movies.plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

movies.title: Incendies
movies.plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

movies.title: L.A. Confidential
movies.plot: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen -- one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy -- investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

movies.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movies.plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

movies.title: Heat
movies.plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

movies.title: Rashômon
movies.plot: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

movies.title: Die Hard
movies.plot: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

movies.title: Yôjinbô
movies.plot: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

movies.title: Unforgiven
movies.plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny (Clint Eastwood) reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan (Morgan Freeman) and a young man, The "Schofield Kid" (Jaimz Woolvett).

movies.title: Ford v Ferrari
movies.plot: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference, the laws of physics and their own personal demons to build a revolutionary race car for Ford and challenge Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

movies.title: Green Book
movies.plot: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

movies.title: Der Untergang
movies.plot: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

movies.title: Bacheha-Ye aseman
movies.plot: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

movies.title: Some Like It Hot
movies.plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

movies.title: Hauru no ugoku shiro
movies.plot: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

movies.title: The Great Escape
movies.plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

movies.title: Tonari no Totoro
movies.plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

movies.title: Ran
movies.plot: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.title: All About Eve
movies.plot: An ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

movies.title: Casino
movies.plot: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.

movies.title: El laberinto del fauno
movies.plot: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

movies.title: Idi i smotri
movies.plot: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

movies.title: Raging Bull
movies.plot: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

movies.title: El secreto de sus ojos
movies.plot: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

movies.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
movies.plot: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
movies.plot: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

movies.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
movies.plot: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

movies.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
movies.plot: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

movies.title: Babam ve Oglum
movies.plot: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after a military coup in 1980's Turkey.

movies.title: Chinatown
movies.plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

movies.title: The Gold Rush
movies.plot: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

movies.title: There Will Be Blood
movies.plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

movies.title: Dial M for Murder
movies.plot: A tennis player frames his neglected wife for murder after she inadvertently foils his plan to have her murdered.

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.plot: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

movies.title: Det sjunde inseglet
movies.plot: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

movies.title: Warrior
movies.plot: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

movies.title: Marriage Story
movies.plot: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Trainspotting
movies.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

movies.title: The Elephant Man
movies.plot: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

movies.title: Room
movies.plot: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.plot: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.title: The Sixth Sense
movies.plot: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

movies.title: The Thing
movies.plot: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

movies.title: Gone with the Wind
movies.plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

movies.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
movies.plot: British POWs build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, oblivious of the Allies' plans to destroy it.

movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

movies.title: The Third Man
movies.plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.plot: A pragmatic Paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movies.title: On the Waterfront
movies.plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies.title: Smultronstället
movies.plot: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

movies.title: Andhadhun
movies.plot: A series of mysterious events changes the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

movies.title: Fargo
movies.plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

movies.title: Gran Torino
movies.plot: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

movies.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
movies.plot: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

movies.title: Eskiya
movies.plot: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

movies.title: The Deer Hunter
movies.plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

movies.title: Klaus
movies.plot: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

movies.title: Tôkyô monogatari
movies.plot: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

movies.title: Stalker
movies.plot: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.plot: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

movies.title: Relatos salvajes
movies.plot: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

movies.title: Mary and Max
movies.plot: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

movies.title: Drishyam
movies.plot: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

movies.title: In the Name of the Father
movies.plot: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.plot: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

movies.title: Hacksaw Ridge
movies.plot: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

movies.title: Salinui chueok
movies.plot: In a small Korean province in 1986, three detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

movies.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
movies.plot: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

movies.title: The General
movies.plot: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

movies.title: Sherlock Jr.
movies.plot: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

movies.title: The Irishman
movies.plot: A mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.

movies.title: Before Sunrise
movies.plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

movies.title: Persona
movies.plot: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

movies.title: Catch Me If You Can
movies.plot: A seasoned FBI agent pursues Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully forged millions of dollars' worth of checks while posing as a Pan Am pilot, a doctor, and a legal prosecutor.

movies.title: Prisoners
movies.plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

movies.title: Cool Hand Luke
movies.plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

movies.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies.plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

movies.title: Into the Wild
movies.plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

movies.title: Le salaire de la peur
movies.plot: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

movies.title: Network
movies.plot: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

movies.title: Stand by Me
movies.plot: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a boyhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

movies.title: Life of Brian
movies.plot: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

movies.title: Platoon
movies.plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

movies.title: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
movies.plot: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

movies.title: Barry Lyndon
movies.plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

movies.title: Million Dollar Baby
movies.plot: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

movies.title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
movies.plot: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

movies.title: Rush
movies.plot: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

movies.title: Rang De Basanti
movies.plot: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

movies.title: Logan
movies.plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

movies.title: Ben-Hur
movies.plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

movies.title: Andrey Rublev
movies.plot: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

movies.title: Kaze no tani no Naushika
movies.plot: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

movies.title: Les quatre cents coups
movies.plot: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movies.plot: Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint), and Hermione (Emma Watson) search for Voldemort's (Ralph Fiennes') remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

movies.title: Hotel Rwanda
movies.plot: Paul Rusesabagina was a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

movies.title: Amores perros
movies.plot: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

movies.title: Dead Poets Society
movies.plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

movies.title: The Red Shoes
movies.plot: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

movies.title: Spotlight
movies.plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

movies.title: Rebecca
movies.plot: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

movies.title: Ace in the Hole
movies.plot: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

movies.title: Rocky
movies.plot: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

movies.title: White Heat
movies.plot: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

movies.title: Ah-ga-ssi
movies.plot: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

movies.title: Monsters, Inc.
movies.plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

movies.title: It Happened One Night
movies.plot: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

movies.title: La haine
movies.plot: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

movies.title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
movies.plot: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

movies.title: Gangs of Wasseypur
movies.plot: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

movies.title: The Princess Bride
movies.plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

movies.title: Before Sunset
movies.plot: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

movies.title: The Help
movies.plot: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

movies.title: PK
movies.plot: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

movies.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
movies.plot: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

movies.title: Faa yeung nin wa
movies.plot: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.plot: In 1984, a human soldier is tasked to stop an indestructible cyborg killing machine, both sent from 2029, from executing a young woman, whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

movies.title: Akira
movies.plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by two teenagers and a group of psychics.

movies.title: Paris, Texas
movies.plot: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

movies.title: Knives Out
movies.plot: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.plot: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

movies.title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
movies.plot: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

movies.title: La battaglia di Algeri
movies.plot: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

movies.title: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta
movies.plot: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
